post.description: Creates a new user account with username, email and password
Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token

put.description: Updates the authenticated user information (username, email, password). Requires JWT token.

delete.description: Deletes the authenticated user account. Requires JWT token and admin password in headers.

parameters.description: Admin password for user deletion authorization
parameters.name: x-admin-password

post.description: Creates a new media content. Requires JWT authentication. Increments user's rating_count.

get.description: Lists all media contents with pagination, filtering and sorting. Requires JWT authentication.
Retrieves a specific media content by its ID. Requires JWT authentication.

put.description: Updates a media content by its ID. Requires JWT authentication.

delete.description: Deletes a media content by its ID. Requires JWT authentication.

post.description: Creates a new rating for a media content. Requires JWT authentication. Users can only rate each media once.

get.description: Lists all ratings with pagination, filtering and sorting. Requires JWT authentication.
Retrieves a specific rating by its ID. Requires JWT authentication.

put.description: Updates a rating by its ID. Users can only update their own ratings. Requires JWT authentication.

examples: You can only update your own ratings
You can only delete your own ratings

delete.description: Deletes a rating by its ID. Users can only delete their own ratings. Requires JWT authentication.

examples: You can only update your own ratings
You can only delete your own ratings

bearerAuth.name: Authorization
bearerAuth.description: Enter your JWT token in the format: Bearer <token>
